_meanings:
{@--5@} ({%a%}) A calamity,
misfortune, distress, evil, disaster'
ill-luck; {#ajYAtaBartfvyasanA muhUrtaM#} 
{#kftopakAreva ratirbaBUva#} <ls>Ku. 3. 73</ls>,
<ls n="Ku.">4. 30</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 57.</ls> ({%b%}) Adversity’
